metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9831 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: An integer overflow vulnerability in the ptp_unpack_EOS_CustomFuncEx function of the ptp-pack.c file of libmtp (version 1.1.12 and below) allows attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds memory access) or maybe remote code execution by inserting a mobile device into a personal computer through a USB cable.

criterions.comment: libmtp package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.1.13-1').
